backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the chat application backend with types and logic for chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, active users, and access control, using ordered maps for storage and HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two UI features (MessageBubble action button color fix and MessageInput redundant character counter removal) to their affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one- to two-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference for the project's frontend architecture and component responsibilities.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the React app with cache-busting meta tags, a root div, and a versioned module script tag pointing to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom (with messageId search param validation), and admin routes, hiding the header and footer on admin pages and the footer on chatroom pages.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component allowing users to update their avatar by uploading an image file, selecting a GIF from a Giphy search/trending feed, or removing their current avatar.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface component that renders filtered messages, handles auto-scroll and deep-link scroll-to-target with highlight, manages reply context, and composes PinnedVideo, MessageBubble, and MessageInput sub-components.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a card for a chatroom with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, displaying topic, category, participant count, and last activity timestamp.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Modal dialog for creating a new chatroom with fields for topic, description, category, and media (file upload, YouTube/Twitch video URL, or Twitter post), including a live tweet preview.
frontend/src/components/ExternalLinkDisc: Dialog that warns users they are leaving the app before navigating to an external URL, with Cancel and Continue actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying a copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with the Chattr logo, a back-to-lobby button when inside a chatroom, and an inline username editor with an avatar picker.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component that renders nothing; authentication is intentionally not used in this app.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders an individual chat message with support for emoji reactions, reply threading, media embeds (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, image, audio, GIF), and a report action.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input component supporting text messages, image attachment, audio recording, and a GIF picker powered by Giphy with debounced search.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Renders a pinned YouTube or Twitch video embed within a chatroom, with an unpin button that calls the useUnpinVideo mutation.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component for voice messages featuring a waveform visualization, play/pause toggle, seek slider, and playback time display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the latest settled value after the delay period.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that purges stale or empty chatroom cache entries and forces a fresh refetch of the chatrooms list once the ICP actor becomes ready, exposing a recovery-in-progress flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context (login, logout, identity state) via a React context provider and hook, backed by the DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Central collection of React Query hooks and mutations for chatrooms, messages, reactions, image uploads, and user identity (username/avatar), all wired to the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives, defines light/dark theme CSS custom properties (OKLCH color tokens), and includes mobile-specific input styles and custom voice message range input styling.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants including the Giphy API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Exports a single utility function `formatCompactNumber` that formats numbers into compact human-readable strings (k, M, B suffixes).
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search Giphy and fetch trending GIFs via the Giphy API, returning normalized GIF objects with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a lazy-loader for the html2canvas library.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses image files using an HTML canvas, with configurable max dimensions, quality, and progress callback.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter embed rendering utility.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON to extract safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM snapshotting, with in-flight deduplication and localStorage caching.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching of Twitter oEmbed preview objects with versioning, expiration (7 days), and cache key derivation from tweet URLs.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter thumbnail fetching utility.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter thumbnail caching utility.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility module exporting functions to extract video/clip IDs and generate thumbnail/embed URLs for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter/X from various URL formats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Password-protected admin moderation page that lists chatrooms with filtering/flagging options and allows admins to delete chatrooms after authentication via a hardcoded password stored in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Page component that loads a specific chatroom by ID, handles loading/error states, increments view count on load, and renders the ChatArea component with optional deep-link target message support.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page displaying a searchable, filterable, and algorithmically sorted list of chatrooms with category badges, a create-chatroom dialog, and navigation to individual chatroom pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radius, box shadow, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for the Chattr app tracking version, existing features (message bubble button color fix and removal of redundant character counter), and configuration flags for the build planner.
